thread.title: BlackRock Attracts Nearly $57 Billion of New Investor Cash

author: Sarah Krouse
title: BlackRock Attracts Nearly $57 Billion of New Investor Cash
text:
BlackRock reports $55bn in long-term net inflows iShares ETFs hauled in the majority of the firm’s new investor cash By Allison Prang April 12, 2018 Updated: 12:43 p.m. GMT 
BlackRock brought in just under $55bn in long-term net inflows for the first quarter of this year, with its massive exchange-traded fund business pulling in the bulk of that new investor cash. 
The company’s iShares ETFs brought in $34.65bn in net inflows in BlackRock’s latest quarter. 
BlackRock chief executive Laurence Fink said in prepared...
